summary: The all-girl school foil an attempt by train robbers to recover two and a half million pounds hidden in their school.
cast: Frankie Howerd|Dora Bryan|George Cole|Reg Varney|Raymond Huntley|Richard Wattis|Portland Mason|Terry Scott|Eric Barker|Godfrey Winn|Colin Gordon|Desmond Walter-Ellis|Arthur Mullard|Norman Mitchell|Cyril Chamberlain|Larry Martyn|Leon Thau|Maureen Crombie|Barbara Couper|Elspeth Duxbury|Carole Ann Ford|Margaret Nolan|Maggie Rennie|Jean St. Clair|Lisa Lee|Peter Gilmore|Michael Ripper|George Benson|Meredith Edwards|Jeremy Clyde|Aubrey Morris|William Kendall|Edwina Coven|Stratford Johns|Chris Adcock|Jack Armstrong|Jack Arrow|Ernest Blyth|Ingrid Boulting|Jonathan Cecil|Maxwell Craig|George Curtis|Jack Dearlove|Peter Evans|Ernest Fennemore|Sally Geeson|Patrick Halpin|Bill Hibbert|Lew Hooper|Pat Judge|Juba Kennerley|Anthony Lang|Roy Lansford|Jack Mandeville|Manny Michael|Lola Morice|George Oliver|Cecil Paul|Amanda Port|Bill Risley|Bess Rogers|Ian Selby|Bill Shine|Jeff Silk|John Smart|Sally-Jane Spencer|Guy Standeven|Emile Stemmler|John Tatham|Jim Tyson|Joe Wadham|Pearl Walters
title: The Great St. Trinian's Train Robbery
